entry.title: Monday: Snow. High minus 11.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries this morning. Snow beginning this afternoon. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 11. Wind chill minus 24 this morning and minus 15 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 08:09 AM EST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Light snow. Low minus 18.
